synopsis.text: Misumi Makoto, an unremarkable high school student, is abruptly transported to an alternate universe to fulfill a cryptic pact his parents had made with a goddess. However, the goddess, repulsed by his appearance, dismisses him as a hero and banishes him to the desolate outskirts of the world. She grants him the ability to communicate with non-human entities as a parting gift. In this unfamiliar realm, Makoto discovers his latent magical prowess and combat skills, which are amplified by the environmental differences. As he traverses the wilderness teeming with mythical creatures like dragons, spiders, orcs, and dwarves, Makoto forges alliances and establishes a harmonious community. Despite his accomplishments, Makoto yearns for human interaction, leading him and his companions on a quest to challenge societal norms and redefine the world that rejected him. Embark on this captivating journey as Makoto transforms adversity into opportunity and reshapes his destiny in this alternate-world social reform fantasy.
